FilterMember.description: Item's property name for filtering collection

FilterMemberValue.description: Value of the property by which the collection will be filtered

Reverse.description: Whether the collection elements should be reversed

Limit.description: Limiting the number of items in the collection

TakeItemIndex.description: Required index of the collection (will consist only of one item by specified index)

TakeItemsFirst.description: Number of the first items of the collection to be included

TakeItemsLast.description: Number of the last items of the collection to be included

CollectionPart.description: Specify the part of the collection to be used (for example: '1/3' will be used only first third of the collection, '3/3' will be used only last third of the collection)
